properties.name: benchmark.data-path
properties.description: Base path for the data files (import + test cases).

properties.name: benchmark.report-path
properties.description: Base path for the generated reports. If not specified, the reports will be generated in the current directory.

properties.name: benchmark.student-mode
properties.description: Indicator for enabling some additional steps that only run in student mode, e.g., truncate tables.
